Name: Total time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants containing both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to reach SW-Reviewer Agreed after First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants where both occur
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average duration of the period starting at First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and ending at the next occurrence of Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Total elapsed time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants that include the full acceptance path
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and First Look-Your updates are due in one week
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week'

Name: Minimum time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Average cycle time of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation when followed by a revised submission path versus a direct acceptance path
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants involving major or minor revisions
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time it takes from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation until the subsequent Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in revision-involved variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Minimum duration between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and the final Manuscript Export Succeeded marking production readiness
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in variants where co-author creation occurs post-first look
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission'

Name: Total time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to RW-EIC Accept in successful multi-round review variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average waiting time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to the next editor-related activity (e.g., Assign a Different Editor or Unassign Editor) in complex variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Minimum time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and the initiation of a new reviewer selection phase (e.g., RW-Initial Reviewer Selection)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'RW-Initial Reviewer Selection'
